comma-spacing.description:
Description

This rule enforces consistent spacing before and after commas in variable declarations, array literals, object literals, function parameters, and sequences.

This rule does not apply in either of the following cases:

- between two commas
- between opening bracket[and comma, to avoid conflicts with thearray-bracket-spacingrule
- between comma and closing bracket], to avoid conflicts with thearray-bracket-spacingrule
- between comma and closing brace}, to avoid conflicts with theobject-curly-spacingrule
- between comma and closing parentheses), to avoid conflicts with thespace-in-parensrule
